txt.en: Destroyed roots of Morloth within Bâr Nírnaeth.
Roots of Morloth can be found in Bâr Nírnaeth, the Houses of Lamentation.\n\nYou should destroy the far reaching roots.

You have successfully destroyed the far reaching roots of Morloth within Bâr Nírnaeth, the Houses of Lamentation, and have done a great service to all those working to reclaim Minas Ithil from the remnants of Sauron's forces.

'Many horrors lie in wait within Bâr Nírnaeth, the Houses of Lamentation. If you are to venture inside, I ask you to burn the far reaching roots of Morloth. The tree's roots desolate the surrounding lands and must be destroyed.'
There is much for the White Company to accomplish in reclaiming Minas Ithil from the remnants of Sauron's forces.
Houses of Lamentation: Roots of Evil
